name: ForageQuest
description:
Full controller support.

Controls:

  • WASD / Left Control Stick - Move
  • WASD / D-Pad - Select quest
  • Shift / R2 - Hurry
  • Space / A (XBox) / B (Switch) / X (PS) - Interact, choose, 

Interact with the sign and select a quest. Collect the desired foregables as quick as you can and return to the front door of your house to get a score. Interact again to restart.

Code: https://github.com/kylelawrence/foragequest

Tileset: https://limezu.itch.io/serenevillagerevamped

Character: https://shubibubi.itch.io/cozy-people

Foragables: https://shubibubi.itch.io/nature-things
